__e: I have to spend my days indoors so that I do not miss his visits. And when he does come to see me, he only says a few words.
I'd like to see her put away somewheres. That's all. Out of my hair.
Well. I want to know about you. About the kind of man... who would keep a woman locked in a room away from her children... when there are people downstairs who...
She stayed in her room all the time the day he died.
And his wife, who stays in that upstairs room all the time.
She's locked in her hotel room quite safe.
Sergeant, you might examine under her fingernails while you're at it.
It's locked from the inside, but they're working on it.
These people have been holed up for three days without any food or water.
They have a 8 tons steel door, food, water for two weeks.
I already have, but it seems to be bolted on the outside.

What were you doing locked in here?
